title: WTF RIOT, my game client bugs in my PROMO'S
body:
WTF RIOT, In my promo game the client bugs out so i cant even get into game.. I restart my lol and try desperately to get when i do manage to get in, it is already remade? and counts as a loss as well as giving me a penalty for a leave?.... 

WTF Riot when i just want to play the game and have fun you do dis to me?
Either make it so when someone is trying to reconnect, give them a chance OR FIX YOUR GODDAMN CLIENT!!! HOLY SHIT!

replies.body: The Client is a little buggy recently, I admit but instead of flaming at Riot. They've got enough stuff  to do. Repair the client in the startup menu..

I'm sorry, post was made in the heat of the moment.. does repairing it help fix the issue? cause it's like the 1st time it happened in a while.. i was just mad because it was my promo's. I know riot is going all they can tho and good on them.

Repairing the client should hopefully fix it. you will lose any custom builds you've made. But it should hopefully fix any problems you've got. In the near Future Riot is releasing their own client which should be absolutely beautiful. It looks fantastic and it's only just hitting the PBE from the Alpha stage.
